regular-body.p: Ignore the post below. While it did upgrade to 1.2.0, unfortunately, nothing worked properly. Now I can’t seem to install anything and am receiving the following error: (Gem::RemoteFetcher::FetchError).
Screw this - reverting back to 1.1.1 for the time being.

post.regular-title: Upgrading 10 RubyGems 1.2.0 on Ubuntu Hardy Heron

regular-body.p: So doing a simple gem update —system did not work. Nothing to update. Still at RubyGems 1.1.1
Turns out the solution, after a bit of Googling, is:

post.regular-body: I’m getting pretty close to being done writing my Tumblr4Rails plugin. So far it looks pretty good and will support Tumblr’s entire API. Just need to do some refactoring and spec enhancements.
